The First principles of the oracles of God explained in a brief exposition of the Creed, the Ten commandments, the Lords prayer and the sacraments : together with several hymns or Psalms of prayer and praise, suited to divers occasions. Downe, Thomas.
[8], 175 p.
Printed for John Hancock ..., London : 1677.
Authorship uncertain; possibly written by Thomas Downe. Cf. BM; Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.). Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
=======
